name: ORS Presumptive Recategorisation Scheme Report
description:
MOV0082 - v1.0 Last Modified: 05/04/2023
This report returns prisoner information for approved and confirmed scheduled transfers to the following Establishments only: FORD (HMP), HATFIELD (HMP & YOI), HAVERIGG (HMP), HOLLESLEY BAY (HMP), KIRKHAM (HMP), KIRKLEVINGTON GRANGE (HMP), LEYHILL (HMP), NORTH SEA CAMP (HMP), NORWICH (HMP & YOI), PRESCOED (HMP & YOI), SPRING HILL (HMP), STANDFORD HILL (HMP), STOKE HEATH (HMPYOI), SUDBURY (HMP & YOI), THORN CROSS (HMPYOI)

dataset.name: Transfers
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_FROM2.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE AS BIRTH_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.EVENT_DATE AS EVENT_DATE, ScheduledMovementReason.DESCRIPTION AS SCHEDULED_MOVEMENT_REASON, AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_TO.DESCRIPTION AS SCHEDULED_ESTABLISHMENT_DEST35, AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.EVENT_TYPE AS EVENT_TYPE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES ScheduledMovementReason, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_FROM2, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_TO, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_FROM, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OFFENDER_IND_SCH_WAIT_LISTS AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCH_WAIT_LISTS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS_From, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = ScheduledMovementReason.CODE) AND (ScheduledMovementReason.DOMAIN = 'MOVE_RSN') AND (AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.TO_AGY_LOC_ID = AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_TO.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_FROM.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('SQZ39G')) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS_From.USERNAME = UPPER('SQZ39G')) AND (AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_FROM2.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS_From.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_FROM2.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_FROM.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_FROM2.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.EVENT_ID = AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCH_WAIT_LISTS.EVENT_ID (+)) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS_From.USERNAME = UPPER('SQZ39G')) AND (AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_TO.DESCRIPTION IN ('FORD (HMP)', 'HATFIELD (HMP & YOI)', 'HAVERIGG (HMP)', 'HOLLESLEY BAY (HMP)', 'KIRKHAM (HMP)', 'KIRKLEVINGTON GRANGE (HMP)', 'LEYHILL (HMP)', 'NORTH SEA CAMP (HMP)', 'NORWICH (HMP & YOI)', 'PRESCOED (HMP & YOI)', 'SPRING HILL (HMP)', 'STANDFORD HILL (HMP)', 'STOKE HEATH (HMPYOI)', 'SUDBURY (HMP & YOI)', 'THORN CROSS (HMPYOI)') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('SQZ39G')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.EVENT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('06-04-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('12-04-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.EVENT_TYPE = 'TRN' AND AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.DIRECTION_CODE = 'OUT' AND AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_TO.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST' AND AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCH_WAIT_LISTS.WAIT_LIST_STATUS = 'CON' AND AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCH_WAIT_LISTS.APPROVED_FLAG = 'Y')), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, EVENT_DATE, SCHEDULED_MOVEMENT_REASON, SCHEDULED_ESTABLISHMENT_DEST35, EVENT_TYPE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Categorisation
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DT_CALC_LEVEL.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, DT_APPROVED_LEVEL.DESCRIPTION AS APPROVED_RESULT FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES DT_CALC_LEVEL, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES DT_APPROVED_LEVEL, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_TO, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OFFENDER_IND_SCH_WAIT_LISTS AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCH_WAIT_LISTS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, (SELECT oa.offender_book_id, oa.assessment_seq, oa.assess_status, oa.review_place_agy_loc_id, oa.assessment_date, oa.calc_sup_level_type, oa.overrided_sup_level_type, oa.review_sup_level_type, oa.next_review_date, rc.description AS review_sup_level_description, oa.evaluation_result_code, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY oa.offender_book_id ORDER BY CASE WHEN oa.assess_status <> 'I' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END, oa.assessment_date DESC, oa.assessment_seq DESC) AS row_seq_filter FROM offender_assessments oa INNER JOIN assessments a ON a.assessment_id = oa.assessment_type_id AND a.assessment_class = 'TYPE' AND a.assessment_code = 'CATEGORY' AND a.determine_sup_level_flag = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN reference_codes rc ON rc.code = oa.review_sup_level_type AND rc.domain = 'SUP_LVL_TYPE') DT_CATEGORISATION, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.TO_AGY_LOC_ID = AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_TO.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('SQZ39G')) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.EVENT_ID = AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCH_WAIT_LISTS.EVENT_ID (+)) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = DT_CATEGORISATION.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (DT_CATEGORISATION.CALC_SUP_LEVEL_TYPE = DT_CALC_LEVEL.CODE (+)) AND (DT_CATEGORISATION.REVIEW_SUP_LEVEL_TYPE = DT_APPROVED_LEVEL.CODE (+)) AND (DT_CALC_LEVEL.DOMAIN (+) = 'SUP_LVL_TYPE') AND (DT_APPROVED_LEVEL.DOMAIN (+) = 'SUP_LVL_TYPE') AND (AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_TO.DESCRIPTION IN ('FORD (HMP)', 'HATFIELD (HMP & YOI)', 'HAVERIGG (HMP)', 'HOLLESLEY BAY (HMP)', 'KIRKHAM (HMP)', 'KIRKLEVINGTON GRANGE (HMP)', 'LEYHILL (HMP)', 'NORTH SEA CAMP (HMP)', 'NORWICH (HMP & YOI)', 'PRESCOED (HMP & YOI)', 'SPRING HILL (HMP)', 'STANDFORD HILL (HMP)', 'STOKE HEATH (HMPYOI)', 'SUDBURY (HMP & YOI)', 'THORN CROSS (HMPYOI)') AND (DT_CATEGORISATION.row_seq_filter = 1 OR DT_CATEGORISATION.row_seq_filter IS NULL) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('SQZ39G')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.EVENT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('06-04-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('12-04-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.EVENT_TYPE = 'TRN' AND AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.DIRECTION_CODE = 'OUT' AND AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_TO.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST' AND AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCH_WAIT_LISTS.WAIT_LIST_STATUS = 'CON' AND AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCH_WAIT_LISTS.APPROVED_FLAG = 'Y')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DESCRIPTION, APPROVED_RESULT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Alerts
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_FROM2.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, AT_HEADER_BLOCK.OFF_ALERTS AS OFF_ALERTS, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_TYPE AS ALERT_TYPE, AT_ALERT_CATEGORY_DESC.DESCRIPTION AS ALERT_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION, AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION AS ALERT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE AS ALERT_CODE, AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE AS BIRTH_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.EVENT_DATE AS EVENT_DATE, ScheduledMovementReason.DESCRIPTION AS SCHEDULED_MOVEMENT_REASON, AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_TO.DESCRIPTION AS SCHEDULED_ESTABLISHMENT_DEST35, AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.EVENT_TYPE AS EVENT_TYPE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_ALERT_CATEGORY_DESC, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES ScheduledMovementReason, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_FROM2, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_TO, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_FROM, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OFFENDER_IND_SCH_WAIT_LISTS AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCH_WAIT_LISTS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.V_HEADER_BLOCK AT_HEADER_BLOCK, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_ALERTS AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS_From, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_ALERT_CATEGORY_DESC.DOMAIN = 'ALERT' OR AT_ALERT_CATEGORY_DESC.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.PARENT_CODE = AT_ALERT_CATEGORY_DESC.CODE) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN = 'ALERT_CODE' OR AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = ScheduledMovementReason.CODE) AND (ScheduledMovementReason.DOMAIN = 'MOVE_RSN') AND (AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.TO_AGY_LOC_ID = AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_TO.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_FROM.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('SQZ39G')) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS_From.USERNAME = UPPER('SQZ39G')) AND (AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_FROM2.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS_From.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_FROM2.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_FROM.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_FROM2.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.EVENT_ID = AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCH_WAIT_LISTS.EVENT_ID (+)) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_HEADER_BLOCK.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS_From.USERNAME = UPPER('SQZ39G')) AND (AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_TO.DESCRIPTION IN ('FORD (HMP)', 'HATFIELD (HMP & YOI)', 'HAVERIGG (HMP)', 'HOLLESLEY BAY (HMP)', 'KIRKHAM (HMP)', 'KIRKLEVINGTON GRANGE (HMP)', 'LEYHILL (HMP)', 'NORTH SEA CAMP (HMP)', 'NORWICH (HMP & YOI)', 'PRESCOED (HMP & YOI)', 'SPRING HILL (HMP)', 'STANDFORD HILL (HMP)', 'STOKE HEATH (HMPYOI)', 'SUDBURY (HMP & YOI)', 'THORN CROSS (HMPYOI)') AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_STATUS = 'ACTIVE') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('SQZ39G')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.EVENT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('06-04-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('12-04-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.EVENT_TYPE = 'TRN' AND AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCHEDULES.DIRECTION_CODE = 'OUT' AND AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS_SCH_TO.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST' AND AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCH_WAIT_LISTS.WAIT_LIST_STATUS = 'CON' AND AT_OFFENDER_IND_SCH_WAIT_LISTS.APPROVED_FLAG = 'Y')), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, OFF_ALERTS, ALERT_TYPE, ALERT_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION, ALERT_DESCRIPTION, ALERT_CODE, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, EVENT_DATE, SCHEDULED_MOVEMENT_REASON, SCHEDULED_ESTABLISHMENT_DEST35, EVENT_TYPE FROM dataset_base_)
